"T: Base Defense: Despair":
"アークス各員に緊急連絡。
惑星リリーパの採掘基地周辺に
強力な多数のダーカー反応を確認した。
既に侵食は進み、絶望的な状況下にある。
だが、我々は諦めるわけにはいかない。
拠点防衛用に新たに開発された
A.I.Sを駆使し、ダーカーを迎撃せよ。
――――――――――――――――――――
全8ウェーブ
失敗条件/全拠点の陥落"
"Defiende la base minera!"

y estan corrompiendo los Socket de defensas tambien...
por favor, trabajen en conjunto para derrotar a!"

"We have reactions coming from multiple locations! Bevcareful not to get attacked all at once!"

hopefully, this is the last of it?

"Another powerful enemy has appeared! This is the last wave though, I'm sure of it! Please, do your best!"

"It seems a lot of crystals are gathering in the

"If left alone, corrupted sockets will generate Darker turrets. Keep an eye out!"

"Recuerde que debe purificar las tomas infectadas... De lo contrario, la corrupcion va a crecer. Preparese para el proximo ataque!"

"There's a large reaction coming! Is your A.I.S ready?
Don't forget about the photon particle cannon!"

"Excellent work! I think that was all of... Huh?

"We will begin the operation shortly.
